title: Scrum Master + Full-stack Developer
subtitle: CGI Finland
description: I work 50/50 as a full-stack developer and as a scrum master for a medium-sized international team.

title: Consultant
subtitle: CGI Portugal
description: I transferred to Lisbon, Portugal to mentor our Portuguese colleagues and to act as a vital link between our offices in Finland and Portugal. I continued working on the same project from there as a Scrum Master. I was supposed to in Lisbon for six months to manage the near-shore team but it got cut short because of the pandemic.

title: Scrum Master & Developer
subtitle: CGI Finland
description: After my exchange studies in Belgium I returned to CGI and I was given more responsibilities. I acquired a SAFe 4 certificate and became the Scrum Master of our international development team.

title: Junior Developer
subtitle: CGI Finland
description: I was part of a three-man team that created a brand new web application and an admin panel for it from scratch for the Finnish government and it's citizens.

title: Freelancer
subtitle: Centone Oy
description: I created a simple static website for their accounting firm according to their specifications.
